types.html:
libéré (feminine libérée, masculine plural libérés, feminine plural libérées)

  1. freed, liberated, released (made free, set at liberty)
    Prisonnier, forçat libéré. ― Prisoner, released convict.
  2. discharged, freed, released (discharged from a debt, from a servitude)
    Libéré des charges qu’il avait contractées. ― Discharged from the expenses that he had incurred.
